text: The Cincinnati Steam Paper Mill was the first steam powered mill in Cincinnati, Ohio, established in 1825 and owned by the Messrs. Phillips & Spear company. It provided paper for the surrounding area as well as surplus shipped to New Orleans, Louisiana. ==References== Category:1825 establishments in Ohio Category:Pulp and paper mills in the United States Category:Defunct companies based in Cincinnati Category:Defunct pulp and paper companies Category:History of Cincinnati Category:Buildings and structures in Cincinnati
title: Cincinnati Steam Paper Mill
